Text: Hang in ThereDon Chuck updated me on the status of our discussions re trading and creating a TradersNews Energy product on EOL I fully understand that corporately you have a lot on your plate right now and we will be patient I would like to meet with you in a few weeks when the dust settles a bit I do have a one quick question My sources indicate that Enron has agreed to place a MegawattDaily Cinergy Hourly product on EOL within weeks Is this a true statement Please RSVP Thanks C Miles Weigel Chief Operating Officer IPGTradersNews Energy email phone x
